title: Mixture of Experts Powers the Most Intelligent Frontier AI Models, Runs 10x Faster on NVIDIA Blackwell NVL72
description: The top 10 most intelligent open-source models all use a mixture-of-experts architecture. Kimi K2 Thinking, DeepSeek-R1, Mistral Large 3 and others run 10x faster on NVIDIA GB200 NVL72. A look under the hood of virtually any frontier model today will reveal a…
content:
• The top 10 most intelligent open-source models all use a mixture-of-experts architecture.
  • Kimi K2 Thinking, DeepSeek-R1, Mistral Large 3 and others run 10x faster on NVIDIA GB200 NVL7… [+11458 chars]
